taglist.name: Connection
taglist.description: Open half of Hallownest's Stag Stations.

nodelist.name: Or will you take the weapon before you, and cut your way out of this sad, forgotten dream?
At this high vantage I can just make it out, the light from that sad little town.
Do you know of the Kingdom's five great knights? They're revered figures of Hallownest, often mentioned in the annals of the Kingdom, but only as a group.
The scene depicts a lush green forest area with ancient structures and a large, broken mask.
Token Marker These markers are new additions to the shop. You can use them to mark interesting spots on your map! This understated colour makes me think of hunting underground for treasure...
My name is Cornifer, and I've always loved exploring the world. Why, when I was first hatched I wandered off immediately, leaving my brothers and sisters and poor mother behind!
Protector of root and leaf, we honour you.
A dark, ethereal setting with ornate structures and glowing orbs, featuring spiritual and mysterious elements.
Hoy! Watch where you're going, you soggy vagabond! I don't want you splashing me. I've had a miserable time trying to keep dry.
A vibrant, underwater-themed area with floating jellyfish and lush, bubble-like scenery.
Ahh but so sad, my trunk is telling me those Fungal Wastes are close and I sense my damp adventure may have reached its end. Guess I'll be calling this map done.
A character stands before an entrance in a lush, bioluminescent area.
A subterranean cavern with purple crystals and a large beetle statue emitting light.
That noisy old lift, where does it go? Up to the old mines they carved into the peak, I suppose.
A lush, overgrown area with dense vegetation and ancient ruins.
Is it fear I wonder, or something else that holds me back?
For so long I’ve felt drawn here. So many tales full of wonders and horrors. No longer could I resist. I just had to see it for myself.
Yet still our Seals remain. Our duty holds.
Already you've collected 100 Essence. Quick work! Things come naturally to you, don't they?
I'm not surprised you survived the trek through these shimmering caverns.
My understanding of Hallownest can be a little vague, but below those leafy caverns is a fungal grove, once home to peaceful creatures not quite bug and not quite plant.
A great stone egg, lying in the corpse of an ancient kingdom. And this egg...Is it warm? It certainly gives off a unique air.
After a Nailsmith are you? Well you've found one. I'm not much for talk, but if its a nail that needs repair then you've come to the right bug.
Somewhere amongst the lines lies the Stag Nest, the place where I was born and raised. I'd thought its location lost to my failing mind, but now I can almost remember the path.
From moss and leaf our life is drawn. While it grows upon the path we shall never wilt.
Consumed the Desolate Dive. Tap A while holding DOWN to strike the earth with a burst of power. Spells will deplete SOUL. Replenish SOUL by striking enemies.
To persevere in this ruin, that old nail alone just won't be enough. Though that's no problem! One only has to look around.
But that talisman you now wield, the Dream Nail… it can cut through the veil that separates the waking world from our dreams. Even the Dreamers themselves can not hide from such a weapon.
If you look down from here, through the rain, you can just make out those twisted sentries, their husks still stuck in endless patrol.
Ancient structures emitting mystical symbols with a character standing in front.
Go no further, little shadow.
...ugghh, Oro you oaf.... You wield your nail... like a club...
...Tired...
Collected a Charm Soul Catcher. Equip a charm to activate its powerful abilities. To equip a charm, open the CHARMS menu while resting at a bench.
Scarab Marker These markers are new additions to the shop. You can use them to mark interesting spots on your map! The colour is quite soothing, don't you think?
Then take it! My journal. It will aid you. At first the text may seem difficult to discern, but a learned hunter will come to understand its words.
Hmm... Do you collect a lot of Geo?
The environment depicts a dimly lit, cavernous area with ancient architectural features.
Taken the Mantis Claw. Press Z while sliding against a wall to jump again. Jump from wall to wall to reach new areas.
Ah. I enjoy collecting their like, but there's little information to be gleaned of each.
Ahh my short friend, you've caught me at the perfect time. I'm just about finished charting these noxious caverns.
Give me Geo, and you can see something... nice.
Within my roots, the weakening of the Vessel I plainly feel. Only two obvious outcomes there are from such a thing.
No matter how old I grow, the world still keeps surprises like this stowed away...
Old caverns these ones. Can't you just feel the weight of the kingdom above? It's a heavy thing alright.
Until I heard the bell calling, I didn't even know the Stagways travelled so deep. You've discovered something quite astounding, little one!
I know what you are. I know what you'd try to do. I can't allow it.
Consumed the Crystal Heart. Hold [S] while on the ground or clinging to a wall to concentrate the force. Release the button to blast forwards and fly through the air.
Let us sleep little shadow. Return to your darkness. Allow us our peace.
I pop back to see her whenever I finish mapping an area. She's always so excited to see me.
There, the door is open and you can enter the glade beyond it. Listen closely in there and you may hear the utterings of bugs long gone.
The protagonist stands in a dimly lit, mysterious underground chamber with a large dormant creature beside them.
A memorial stone surrounded by thorny plants and glowing vegetation.
Your face... you're so... so...
As you wish. I'll get to work then.
Oho! There you are! I was watching over you while you slept, and must have slipped away myself. I woke up and found you’d disappeared! You are a surprising one, ohoho!
Very territorial types make their homes within this area. I'd suggest avoiding them where possible.
The environment shows a dark, gothic structure with ornate design and a character standing in front of it.
I too have felt the pull of this place, though now I sit before it I find myself hesitant to descend.
Lush and overgrown area with an enormous creature and ancient ruins.
The scene is set in a lush, dimly lit cave with bioluminescent plants and large mushroom creatures.
Then do it, Ghost of Hallownest! Head onward. Burn that mark upon your shell and claim yourself as King.
I scarcely deserve such a friend as you! You're a marvel! Ohohoho!
I'd wager up there it would take you far. Down here however, I suspect you'll soon meet dangers the surface world can't match.
Searching for dangerous places aye? Well you're on the right track.
He keeps talking about dreams, too. Pfah! Dreams are for those too feeble to truly live.
Hmph. Being overly devoted to one's duties is no virtue.
Those travellers are long gone, yet still I remain. Now it seems it's just you and I and the furtive creatures scratching and squirming all around us.
The first is inevitable on current course, regression, all minds relinquished to that pernicious plague.
There's an air of strength about you. I suspect it would be quite intimidating, if not for your small stature.
A lush and mystical natural area with a protective ambiance.
You're exploring then? Very brave! Plenty of courageous wanderers have been lost to the hunger of these old caverns.
A Hallownest Seal, eh? Very interesting this.
An encounter between the player and a character named Dung Defender in a rocky, underground area.

1. Item: Steady Body I love the simple design on this little fellow! Very classy! It's made out of a nice, solid, heavy material too. Wear it and you'll be able to stay firmly in place when swinging your little nail around.

Lumafly Lantern: What's more important? A light to guide your way, or a friend who'll stay by your side? Why not both? Take this bright little fellow as your companion and he'll light your way through the thickest darkness.

Doomed she thought herself and to despair she fell, until a light bloomed far in the distance, a bright, glowing spot fast approaching. It swept majestic about the thorns, leapt above burning waters and dove towards the maiden.
Ah, but as far as I can tell I'm the only member of my tribe still breathing. That means I needn't feel bad about breaking a taboo. As proof of my belief in you, I'll open the door.
So small it seems...
The environment is an enchanting, glowing forest with floating jellyfish-like creatures and intricate plant life.
Hello again! I suppose you've already met with the tribe of this village, hmm? They seem a little distrustful of strangers... to put it lightly.
...Strange to know such ancient facts. I wonder from where my knowledge comes?
The Pilgrim's Way. Travellers of Hallownest, descend through verdant wilds and fungal groves to the city at this kingdom's heart. There all wishes shall be granted, all truths revealed.
Hmm?
Ahh, quite a view, no?
I... you came here to rescue me, Bretta? The girl that everyone just... ignores?
Yes, your eyes do not deceive you. I am Zote the Mighty, a knight of great renown. Tremble before me!
Shall we wait together, stranger? Shall we play together?
Though they're common finds about the kingdom, I much enjoy the deciphering of their text.
Everything fades eventually, I suppose.
I must admit, I'd placed thin odds on her survival.
I'm sure they wouldn't mind were a fellow explorer to relieve them of their tools. It's a kindness really. The dead shouldn't be burdened with such things.
Before I leave this Kingdom, I'd like to see where all that water comes from. What a sight it must be!
...Bury... body... cover... shell, Darkness. No meaning... DANGEROUS... Still, remain... LIGHT... again...
But could you raise your nail once knowing its tragic conception? And knowing yourself?...
Begone! Lest I draw my nail...
Even as overgrown as they've become, these gardens are still beautiful after all this time. I'm sure the Queen would be happy to know that.
Many used to come, hoping the kingdom would fulfill their desires.
A call from beyond the Seals? By the Vessel, or by that captive light?
A young couple's just recently taken up residence in the house beside the station. Seems they're running a map shop, which may excite adventurous types like yourself.
This place must once have been quite the hub, built at the border between two lands, that misty drop to one side and those bulbous growths another.
Would the Seals break? They cannot be undone.
What compels its climb out of the darkness? What compels its return to this sacred kingdom?
Consumed Isma's Tear. Acid shall be repelled. Swim in acidic waters without coming to any harm.
Ahh, many stag stations have been opened. Again I can travel the breadth of the kingdom. So many grand thoroughfares and old sideways I'd forgotten
Th... thank you.
Consumed Isma's Tear. Acid shall be repelled. Swim in acidic waters without coming to any harm.
Isn't this a cosy hole? I've been venturing about that wilderness beside here and thought a moment's break was well called for.
Sounds almost worth a visit no? Well there's a downside, the dreadful stench! A noxious odour fills the place.
Ah, Wielder, you've returned. Let me have a look at the Dream Nail...
It was a long time ago, but I remember when these highways and crossroads pulsed with life. These are the paths I first carried passengers through when I was young.
Used to be there was a great kingdom beneath our town. It's long fell to ruin, yet it still draws folks into its depths.
There is some shame I feel from my own part in the deed and this method guarantees it cease.
I reckon not many'd reach these depths. We're pioneers you and I, at least in recent history.
Hope and freedom. I thought that strength alone could grant me these things. In my dreams I would cut that plague with my nails, and then I turned my weapons upon the King.
Vessel Fragment: A piece of a Soul Vessel. You know, those ghastly looking orb things? I don't really like the aura about it, but it's quite rare so I'll have to charge you a high price.
Did you pass that town above? What a gloomy little place. And such majesty hidden right beneath!
Fade away, little shadow. Fade away, and let us sleep in peace.
You've certainly made my dreary work here more exciting. Being the caretaker of this place hasn't been very stimulating.
…It faced the void, and ascends unscathed… Could it unite such vast darkness?..
A dark, mysterious cave with bioluminescent elements and waterfalls in the background.
Do not call me a traitor. Simply call me a fool.

Fragile Strength Notch Cost You’re weak, aren’t you? You should give me Geo. If you do, I’ll give you this charm I made. It will make you stronger. Your enemies, and everyone else, will fear you at last...
And what a time I chose to arrive! This dead world has sprung to life.
I can hardly believe those dusty old highways led to such a lush and lively place!
A long necked critter warned me of a tribe deeper down. Warrior sorts, so she says and I'm itching for some serious combat.
A dimly lit room with skull decorations and a bench invites the player to interact with an NPC, indicated by LISTEN.
Items for sale: Simple Key: Simply, a simple key. It will fit a variety of locks, which is useful if you like to poke around in places you don't belong.

Shaman Stone Notch Cost Are you a spellcaster, you little scoundrel? Ho ho! I'm only teasing. If you ever learn any spells you should buy this charm for yourself. I've heard it will make a spell much stronger!
Come no closer, ghost.,
The screenshot shows a dark, cave-like environment with a central platform and a character looking at an insect-like creature hanging upside down.
Coming close, the form revealed at last, a beautiful being, sharp horns gleaming white. Arms reached out for the damsel, gathering her up, grip firm...
Seems to think very highly of her rescuer, some sort of dashing, warrior type. Barely stopped gushing since she got back. ELDERBUG
You're a short one, but you've a strong look about you.
Oh! What?! Who are you?!
...Where have you gone?.. Dear King...
Rancid Egg I found this under the counter. Some creature must have laid it here while I was stuck down in the ruins. I suppose you could buy it? I won't miss its sour odour.
Funny then, that such darkness gives me hope. Within it, I see the chance of change.

The White Saviour The maiden woke in darkness. Confused she reached out. Sharp brambles jabbed at all sides. Burning acid bubbled close below. What nightmare had led her here? What hope of survival remained?
I've some words of advice, my friend. If you plan to challenge the lords of this tribe, your blunted nail may prove inadequate.

Hot Spring Pin I designed these pins to keep track of the kingdom's hot springs. I haven't visited any myself... I wonder if Cornifer might take me sometime? I'm sure you'd make better use of these pins 'til then.
Ho ho! As odd as much of Hallownest can be, there's a whole new level of strangeness about these caves.
A villager brought some of those crystals back to the village once. I don't quite understand the allure myself.
This old kingdom... A terrible thing awakens. I can smell it in the air...
So you'd pursue the deeper truth? It isn't one the weak could bear.
The scene depicts an underwater area with jellyfish-like creatures and platforms.
Esmy... how much deeper do we have to go...
So it can access a mind? Then the seals shall break before its blade.
The screenshot depicts a mystical, cave-like environment with a central character standing in a glowing light.
Hmph. How did you find me, down here where the world ends?
Even overcome, strong purpose has been imprinted upon their husks.
Hmph. What a squalid little hamlet this is. The air is foul and the townsfolk have beady eyes. I'll be heading back down below as soon as possible.
The player character stands before a mysterious, illuminated structure with the option to Inspect.
So, what are you down here for? If you came to g-get wealthy, just look around you! These mines are still bursting with riches! There's p-p-plenty for everyone, just grab a pick and join in! Ha ha!
Entry to the kingdom was forbidden long ago, supposedly after some great calamity. Many gates were closed, but our old well remains as a way to creep back in.
Hallownest... What challengers await in its ruin?
Don't try to sneak past me. I can smell you.
Ahhh, I'm just so happy. Fate can be a wonderful thing.
Those who made it back told of impossibly old structures and roads formed as though the rock itself possessed a will.
This place was once full of travellers coming and going. It seems much quieter now.
Ohhh, bury the knight with her broken nail, bury the… p-priest… something about a crown…? I c-can't remember the rest of that one, ha ha ha! Maybe I'll just hum it.
I'm Sly. Usually, I live an uneventful life up in Dirtmouth. The air in these ruins doesn't agree with me, so I'd best be getting back.
I am Zote the Mighty, a knight of great renown. If I decide that I'm going to stay dry, then that's what's going to happen!
An intense confrontation with the Traitor Lord in a gothic-styled hall with towering arches.
Those figures, those Dreamers... they reached out with what little power they still have and dragged you into that hidden place.
I've heard an arena exists somewhere below. One built for our like. Meet me there and we'll test what skills you possess.
A dark, cave-like environment with rocky platforms and water below, figures standing on a ledge.
A small character stands beside a large sleeping creature in a dark, ornate room illuminated by hanging lights.
I've been waiting a long time, stranger. I've been fighting a long time, stranger.
The greater mind once dreamed of leaf and cast these caverns so. In every bush and every vine the mind of Unn reveals itself to us.
The environment features a lush, green, and intricately designed area with a greenhouse-like structure.
Consumed the Monarch Wings. Press Z while in the air to flap the wings. Use these ethereal wings to sail above enemies and discover new paths.
Oh, what a turn! Our shopkeep's come home. Just wandered back in. I'd hoped for grand tales of his time below, but he seems to remember almost nothing! Maybe it was all too much for him?
If you're planning a trip below, I've several items that may improve your chance of survival.
Now, let's see what's here for me to sell.
It is the law of the Great Nailsage that I must pass down my teachings to those who are worthy.

Lifeblood Heart Have you ever drunk that bright blue liquid, 'lifeblood'? It's a bit of a taboo, but it makes you feel much healthier doesn't it? This charm seeps lifeblood and will certainly improve your constitution!
Gleaming Marker These markers are new additions to the shop. You can use them to mark interesting spots on your map! The material I used for this colour is quite rare, so it costs a little more.
You there! Why are you skulking about in the shadows?
A large knight statue. There is a socket on its chest. Insert the City Crest? Yes No
The setting features tall, mysterious statues and glowing particles with the word CHALLENGE displayed prominently.
No competition. That’s the problem. It’s bad for the market. Not that he’s complaining.
I'll be heading down soon. Come and find me if you dare.
Oh, I've heard tales of the glorious lines. A web of tunnels running all through the kingdom. Not that I'll be travelling them, mind you!
A serene blue-hued environment with gothic architecture in the background.
Consumed the HOWLING WRAITHS. Tap A while holding UP to unleash the Wraiths. Spells will deplete SOUL. Replenish SOUL by striking enemies.
I'd urge you to take that harder path, but what end may come, the decision rests with you.
Oh?! Who are you?
Oh! The Queen! The Queen is coming! I've been waiting so long, and now she's almost here! I feel like I'm about to burst!
Charting such a different space is quite the challenge, though one I've eagerly undertaken.
What are you still bothering me for? I'm a Knight. I'm not interested in your childish games. I need my rest.
The bugs of Hallownest must've been an impressive lot, building such grand structures so far into these wilds.
Both their names and appearance seem to have been expunged from history.
Yes, yes. All glory to me. But I don't have time for your adulation! I must rest and prepare for my next journey down.
Not any more though. Perhaps the dead conduct their own rituals now?
I've seen you, creeping through the undergrowth, stalking me.
A difficult journey you would face, but a choice it can create. Prolong our world's stasis or face the heart of its infection.
Again we meet little ghost.
The character is in a serene, mystical environment with floating orbs and ornate architecture.
Longnail That nail you wield is adorable! But do you sometimes feel it could be a little… longer? Ho! Ho ho ho! Go on, take this charm home with you. Suddenly, your enemies will be within reach…
I've kept it safe, this sacred garden! I've kept it safe for all this time, and soon the Queen will return and teach me to fly!
Ah, what a surprise! It's not often I receive visitors. It's been so long. Ages even. I just hope my manners haven't left me.
I suppose that's why they've all headed down here. Who could resist such possibilities?
Isn't life just wonderful...
The image shows the character in a lush, green architectural setting with hanging vegetation and floating particles.
You could do it, if you had the will.
In any case, you still have a long way to go. Take this old trinket as encouragement from me, and return when you have collected 200 Essence.
I've done my best to chart the area ahead, though I must admit some of the area's inhabitants proved quite a nuisance.
Entrance to a grove; entry allowed only to those who prove their honor in combat.
Prove yourself ready to face it. I'll not hold back. My needle is lethal and I'd feel no sadness in a weakling's demise.
I never thought I'd see such a thing. The Stag Station has opened! That building lay silent since before even my time.
A dark cavern with a somber ambiance and ritual artifacts; the area is known as The Resting Grounds.

In wilds beyond they speak your name with reverence and regret, For none could tame our savage souls yet you the challenge met, Under palest watch, you taught, we changed, base instincts were redeemed, A world you gave to bug and beast as they had never dreamed. From 'Elegy for Hallownest' by Monomon the Teacher
A dilapidated, skull-filled, underground passage lit by scattered lanterns.
But the Vessel weakens. That plague springs anew. They must be undone.
Here ends the Pilgrim's Way. Hallownest's Heart lays open before you. Proceed onward to share in its glory.
Further below some strange thin creatures gave me quite a scare. They seemed an intelligent bunch.
Charm Notch : You want to wear a lot of charms, don't you? Of course you do! Charm Notch : Buy this charm notch and you'll be able to wear more of your charms at once.
...So strong...
Fragile Greed: Very, very, special and valuable charm! Do you want to find more Geo? Hold this charm and go hunting! Then bring any Geo you find back to me!
The environment features a sealed gate, emphasizing no entry or exit.
Sorry, when I look at your face I can hardly... I just can't believe you came all the way down here to rescue me. I didn't think anybody...
Aye Aye. Come searching for rare items have you? Well hands off! This collection is mine and I won't be selling to grubby little wanderers.
I have a gift, held long for one of your kind. Half of a whole. When united, great power is granted, and on the path ahead, great power it will need.
Shell Marker These markers are new additions to the shop. You can use them to mark interesting spots on your map! You could use this colour to remind yourself of hard-won battles.
Ah! What station is this, hidden all the way at the bottom of the world?
...Well I was... once, until those cretins cast me out.
Curse this wretched city! Water and monsters constantly fall from above! It's no wonder this blasted kingdom fell to ruin…
Did you know the caverns continue even below the capital? Few have ventured that deep so the details are scant.
The scene depicts two characters seated on a bench within a dimly lit cathedral-like structure.
You're quite the explorer to find this place.
I'm Salubra, and this is my cosy little Charm store. Did the townfolk out there tell you to come and visit me? Mmm, yes! This is a lovely little village isn't it? Warm and intimate and full of life.
Use these pins to mark shopkeepers or any other interesting bugs you find on your travels. Every so often, you should pass by and see how they're doing. I'm sure they'd like that.
That's a special thing I suppose, to cherish these sights, even in their decay.
Ahhhh, you've returned. Welcome back to the waking world.
Those who stray from the White King's roads shall face the law of Unn.
Cursed are those who turn against the King.
Isn't this a wonderful spot for a rest? I so love the sound of the rain upon glass.
Plenty have come before us and most have met their grisly end, many more equipped than you and I.
Greetings, little one! It's been an age since I last heard the ringing of a station bell. It echoed down the stagways and called me to you.
Ho there, traveller. I'm afraid there's only me left to offer welcome. Our town's fallen quiet you see.
Ah, hello! I knew we'd meet again. How do you like my cosy little store? I've made myself pretty comfortable here, selling old trinkets to travellers like yourself.
The environment features a dark cave with luminous, rune-engraved doorways and towering spiked structures.
Ehh. Pale thing. You use these old lines? Pathetic. A real warrior carries himself to combat. He has no need for such convenience.
I implore you, usurp the Vessel. Its supposed strength was ill-judged. It was tarnished by an idea instilled. But you. You are free of such blemishes. You could contain that thing inside.
I never begrudged the Wyrm's dalliance as bargain. In fact, I feel some affection for the creature birthed.
If your paths were ever to align, I imagine you might gain yourself a powerful ally.
A serene cave environment with glowing symbols and a tall rock formation.
I know you will not flee. Wherever you go... I will be watching.
A tranquil, biomechanical area with soft glowing lights and intricate structures.
But no law forbids me from exacting a payment for my time. If you truly wish to train under me, prove it with Geo!
Wealth, glory, enlightenment, that darkness seems to promise all things. I'm sure you too seek your dreams down there.
The player character is standing near the entrance of a large, organic-looking structure lit from within.
Dark, cavernous setting with a large creature next to a pedestal holding a smaller figure.
Something important has drawn you down into Hallownest's corpse, but I won't ask what. Perhaps the reason you've found me is because you need my help?
I'd be cautious around them my short friend. Their training will not have been forgotten. This city presents some formidable foes.
The way she has to bend just to get through the door...I wouldn't put up with it myself.
Ah ha! The tiny steps of a tiny creature. You got the look of an adventurer, so we've much in common.
Come to scale the mountain? I've heard tale of a summit way up there. Too far for me though and I'm not really one for heights.
Do you feel the urge inside, to stalk, to kill, to understand?
Cocoon Pin Have you seen those beautiful blue cocoons? I made these pins so you can keep track of them. The cocoons are pretty, but very delicate. Please be careful around them.
…Turn it off?… Cannot…
Fragile Heart: Cost: 350 This is a precious thing. A beautiful charm. I made it for you! If you hold it you'll feel a lot healthier. Notch Cost: 2
I remember this station well. A common trip it was. Goods from all over the kingdom were transported here.
Hm. Now it's nothing more than a poisonous tomb full of monsters and madness.
Taken the White Fragment
The screenshot showcases a dark and eerie area named Ancient Basin.
I saw a strange fellow out there. He seemed quite taken by the lake.
Your own nail is in quite a sorry state. It's obviously not one of mine. Still, anything can be refined with enough effort and skill, even that broken blade.
If you're interested in his wares, watch out! He drives a hard bargain, that one.
Record Aba The mind still limits us so. How to break past its constraints? To attain a pure focus, is it even possible?
Ghost. I see you've faced the place of your birth, and now drape yourself in the substance of its shadow.
Those who made it back told of impossibly old structures and roads formed as though the rock itself possessed a will.
Well watch out. It's a sickly air that fills the place. Creatures turn mad and travelers are robbed of their memories.
I-I'm sorry. I got lost, I don't know how I ended up here.
Oh, by the way, I haven't introduced myself have I? Yes, I should apologise for that. When you spend a lot of time by yourself, with just your own thoughts, you forget the niceties of conversation.
They're not brutes though, no. The sickness in the air that clouds the mind of lesser beasts… they resist it. They retain their intellect and their honour, though also their lethal traditions.
Taken the DREAM NAIL. Hold D to charge and slash with the nail. Cut through the veil between dreams and waking.
The scene depicts the protagonist in a dark cavern with flowing, web-like structures.
Do I seem prisoner here? If so, it's not by any choice but my own. These bindings about me, I've chosen to erect.
Before you rang the bell, I'd almost forgotten this station existed. It was not often used by the common bugs, being a well-guarded retreat for our late Queen.
The screenshot shows the entrance to Dirtmouth, a fading town.
Continue to open the stations and you'll have my deepest gratitude.
I'll offer fair warning! The Vessel may itself be weak, but it is much empowered by that force within.
Higher beings, these words are for you alone. Our pure Vessel has ascended. Beyond lies only the refuse and regret of its creation.
Did you see that dark gate below? It's quite unsettling to be near. I did my best to avoid it.
Ah... I can see now. Those who turn against the King are doomed as soon as they raise their weapon.
Did it sadden you to see those miners below, still labouring at their endless task?
Can you imagine this place in its time? Hordes of bugs travelling about the Kingdom; stag bells ringing; the station bustling with activity and life.
Feeling tired? That bench may be iron, but I assure you it's quite comfortable. There's no better place to collect your thoughts before heading below.
The capital lies before us my friend. What a sombre place it seems and one that holds the answers to many a mystery.
Though once our lands, a pale being lays claim to the caverns ahead. It may appear benevolent but it does not share our dream. Be wary to wander that place.
In my youth I'd have braved their caves but I fear my matured physique wouldn't be able to outrun them were they to turn violent.
Though I must admit, that sacred blade has dulled over time. Together perhaps, we can restore its power. You only have to bring me Essence.
Bear witness to the last and only civilisation, the eternal Kingdom. Hallownest
Seems the dangerous creatures about haven't yet made their way in here. It's the perfect place for a quick rest.
Ooooooooooohhhhhh, you surprised me! Hello, hello! Come in, sweetling! Come in and make yourself at home.
My vault is much more secure. In all my time as a banker, I've never lost a single Geo!
I've a fondness for exploring myself. Getting lost and finding your way again is a pleasure like no other. We're exquisitely lucky, you and I.
Know this, cur. I am Zote the Mighty, a knight of great renown. Cross me again, and you'll find out why they call my weapon 'Life Ender'.
Not a lot was sent back the other way though.
A small floating platform with ornate fencing, set against a dreamy, glowing backdrop.
Have you been up there? Is it true that crystals grow everywhere you step?
You can't eat them, and they don't make very good pillows. They hardly seem worth all the trouble to me.

Stalwart Shell. Life in Hallownest can be tough, always taking hits and getting knocked around. This charm grants you more time to recover after taking damage. Useful if you need to escape from a tight spot.
Ho ho! Aren't these waterways thrilling? A labyrinth of pipes and tunnels.
Feel free to stop by anytime. Though I do like the quiet in this station, a little company is always good for one's health.

Hallownest Seal. These ornate seals were the official symbols of the King and his Knights, and were treasured by those who carried them. The King and his Knights are long gone, but the seals still hold value as curiosities. I'll pay a modest price for them.
Oh! Come in search of treats have you? I chanced upon a unique little fungus growing right above us. I've found it only in this station and the taste is just divine.
The Knight stands in a dimly lit area with organic structures and ruins around.
The second I find preferable, and would seek your aid in its occurance, replacement.
This ancient kingdom holds many fascinating mysteries, and one of the most intriguing of them is standing right before us.
I'm normally quite perceptive. You I underestimated, though I've since guessed the truth.
The crystal ore is said to contain a sort of energy, not as powerful as the soul the city dwellers harnessed but far less lethal.
When I awoke in this sacred place, I began to understand. Those who hope are already doomed.
This building suggests some form of worship, though its idol has clearly been long forgotten. Doubles equally well for a moment's respite.
Say no more, friend. I'm going to give you a gift, a nasty little spell of my own creation. It's just perfect for a little one like you! Ohoho!
The protagonist stands in a dimly lit cave with multiple large cocoon structures containing caterpillar-like creatures.
The warrior must have passed down below whilst I was taking my nap. Such a shame. I'd have loved to meet so impressive a bug.
That lovely young lass returned to us!
That daft old fellow over there... He keeps talking absolute drivel. Seems to think the very air is deadly down in the caverns. Perhaps he should consider not breathing.
That's why as soon as I could I moved to Dirtmouth with my wife. A huge, unending Kingdom to explore right on our doorstep. Who could resist?
If, knowing that truth, you'd still attempt a role in Hallownest's perpetuation, seek the Grave in Ash and the mark it would grant to one like you.
You've seen beyond this kingdom's bounds. Yours is resilience born of two voids.
The scene shows the Temple of the Black Egg with an option to LISTEN.
I still feel that urge you see. I always will. A voracious desire to spread seeds upon the land, to propagate myself, to breed.
Show me you can accept this Kingdom's past and claim responsibility for its future.
I do so love a mystery... And who knows what other marvels lie even deeper below us...
The player character stands on a verdant, overgrown platform in a cavernous area, facing a small flying creature.
No wonder the Dreamers tried to bury you in that old dream. Perhaps you frighten them? Or perhaps, being prisoners themselves, they desired your company?
“Hallownest is perfect for vigilant explorers like us. So tense and thrilling. In this place, you’re either alert or you’re dead.”
The landscape's all rather serene this side of the city, though the inhabitants are as ferocious as ever.
This place... we are near the surface, I believe? There is a town here. You should take the opportunity to rest.
I'm a cartographer by trade, and I'm working on mapping this area right now. Would you like to buy a copy of my work so far?
The environment features a dark, eerie area with the text Broken Vessel.
Do you still hope, wanderer? Will you flee? Or will you raise your weapon and doom us both?
The braver among us once went there to pray, said they felt at peace within the walls. After a while, they stopped going. I wonder what changed?
He'll pop back occasionally to deliver new maps for the store but I do wish he'd spend a little more time up here. I've not much interest in retail myself.
So long has passed since their time. It'd be a grand achievement to discover their identities.
A map can be a useful thing, but it alone won't show you where you are. If you've not the head for directions, I suggest purchasing a compass from my wife, Iselda.
I couldn't have asked for a better place to employ my talents. It's all so orderly, so considered, nothing like the crude irregularity of those caverns.

To protect the Vessel, the Dreamers lay sleeping. Monomon the Teacher In her Archive, surrounded by fog and mist. Lurien the Watcher In his Spire, looking over the city. Herrah the Beast In her Den, amidst the deep darkness beyond the kingdom. Through their devotion, Hallownest lasts eternal.
Pale thing. You wear that nail with ease. If you're in search of combat, you'll find no great warriors in this decaying burrow.
Stop there! Those who try to leave this kingdom are cursed. Better to rest here, until time itself sleeps.
The character is at Hollownest's Crown, a serene yet eerie place with ancient designs on the stones.
Wake me when the Queen arrives, stranger. Perhaps the Queen will teach us both to fly, stranger!
Perhaps you'd care to purchase a copy of my achievements so far?
Hello there dearie. I was about to close up shop and run, till you came along. I provide a banking service if you're interested.
“Absorbed the SHADE CLOAK. Use the cloak to dash through enemies and their attacks without taking damage.”
Though our strength is born of similar source, that part of you, that crucial emptiness, I do not share.
The creatures are riled up and the earth rumbles. The air is thick. I wonder what could have brought it all about?
She's just now opening our new map shop in Dirtmouth, selling all sorts of useful things to wanderers like yourself. She'll even sell some of my old maps from time to time.
If you return above, come and see me. I'm probably the friendliest face left there, and I can thank you properly for your good deed.
Memorial to the Hollow Knight. In the Black Vault far above. Through its sacrifice Hallownest lasts eternal.
A character navigates a dark, cavernous area with architectural elements and encounters a creature in a jar.
...Oho? Well, yet another surprise! You've slain that creature before I've even asked!
Perhaps dreams aren't such great things after all...
Tiny squib... You approach fearless. Are you a hunter like me?
What a terrible fate they've visited upon you.
As inhospitable as it is, I've enjoyed my travels here. Care to see my efforts?
If you'd like, I can reforge your nail. It'll make the blade far more deadly.
Keep sharp my adventurous friend. Stay alive and let's meet again on the road ahead.
Just what do you think you're doing?! You dare to come between me and my prey? Is it a habit of yours to scurry about, getting in the way and causing bother?
There is a city nearby, the old capital of Hallownest. I've heard a Nailsmith resides there. Seek the old bug out and you may find progress that much easier.
Can it be opened? There are strange marks all over it...
I see. This old village. What a strange dream, to have led me down here! If you hadn't found me, I don't think I would've ever woken.
I shouldn't complain though. Tending these graves and guiding the Wielder... all penitence for old crimes. Certain things have to be kept in balance.
As I visit more places I feel my memories returning to me, like the stagways of my mind are running once more.
I'm Quirrel. I have something of an obsession with uncharted places.
Truly a marvel...
Still, I imagine you come across many interesting items in your travels. Maybe you'd care to part with some? I'll offer a fair trade for each.
You have your nail though, and I can tell just by looking that you know how to wield it.
Mind you, they do keep a nice shine about them and there's nothing wrong with appreciating something purely on aesthetic merits.

Quick Focus. Notch Cost: 3. The crystal set in the centre is lovely, isn't it? Exquisite, even! I've heard that crystals help you to 'focus,' so if that's something you're interested in you should take this beauty home!
Have you heard of Hallownest's Queen? Apparently these gardens were once her retreat.
A dark, wooden, spike-filled area with platforms and a resting spot for the character.
A dimly lit, cavernous area with wooden structures and an armoured figure.
Mmm… What were we talking about? Oh yes, Charms! I can see you've started your own collection. Very nice! I'll show you some of my own, and you can take one home with you if you like!
I'm very, very tired! The Queen will be here soon, and I just need to sleep a little.
While you were hiding here in your dingy little village, I ventured into the dark pit below us and slew a great beast. It had sharp mandibles and atrocious manners.
Over the years, all kinds used the well to wriggle into the ruins, wanderers, thieves, adventurers.
You... forgot about me...? I knew you would... everyone always forgets about me...
Will you accept their judgement and fade slowly away?
Yes, I know why you're here. You came to learn a Nail Art from the legendary Nailmaster Oro.
The environment features a dark, eerie setting known as The Abyss.
Funny how few ever come back up. Perhaps they find what they're looking for?..
A dimly lit cavern with ancient pillars and mysterious structures.
Bah, I'm not so naive. No doubt, they've all been gobbled up! There are countless dangers in those depths.
Taken the Mothwing Cloak. Press C to dash forwards.
The other residents, they've all disappeared. Headed down that well, one by one, into the caverns below.
The player character is in a dark, cavernous area, standing on a small platform with eerie surroundings.
The player explores a dimly lit cavern with intricate, gothic architecture.
Ahh, this gladdens me. The Queen's Station has opened once more. This place was a bustling hub of travel, well-placed for travellers visiting the outer edges of the land.
Did you know the caverns continue even below the capital? Few have ventured that deep so the details are scant.
Fortunate for me, I found another route in, though I did end up a little singed after wading through some acid.
Go out into the world, Wielder. Hunt down the Essence that lingers there!
My, this place is much changed since I last saw it. The greenery grows so wild the station's like to be consumed by it.
Your nail looks a fine instrument, but it's showing signs of wear.
Sorry... I mean, thank you. I mean... I'd better go. Back to town I mean. I'd better get home...
Oh, hello there! Seems we both tread far from the path.
The scene shows an eerie, dimly lit room with tall, ominous figures in the background and glowing particles floating around.
These stagways stretch the depths of Hallownest. If you want to travel them, hail me from the platform. I will take you where you need to go.
I'd planned to offer greetings, though figured I'd first tend to my nail on chance our meeting goes poorly.
Oh, stranger... you're strong. Much stronger than me...
Ohhh, bury my mother, pale and slight, bury my father with his eyes shut tight! Bury my sisters two by two, and then when you're done, let's bury me toooo!
I doubt its residents could even comprehend the scale of the world that surrounds them.
To cast you away into this space between body and soul.
The screenshot depicts the Fungal Wastes area, characterized by glowing mushrooms and a unique atmosphere.
Whispers its location to the bearer whenever a map is open, allowing wanderers to pinpoint their current location.
The environment features a large organic structure with horn-like protrusions surrounded by dense plant life.
Is it that, just faintly, you can still hear the echo of the bells?
Essence... the precious fragments of light that dreams are made of. Collect it wherever you find it, and bring it to me. Once we have enough, we can work wonders together.
Have you brought me another nail to be honed? Leave it on the ground and return later, if you're still breathing.
It's no surprise then you've managed to reach the heart of this world. In so doing, you shall know the sacrifice that keeps it standing.
Maybe you'd considered opening an account?
Plus I enjoy the company. Not that you seem the talkative sort.
Leave me be. It's the arena I seek. I've already wasted far too long on these cursed roads.
Have you seen that great door just outside? My tribe closed it long ago and forbade its opening.
Now only our like even know it exists.
She's a tall bug, the wife. I told them to take a larger house, especially given they’re all empty, but they liked the look of that one.
Isn't this something. I'd not expected to discover so huge a Stag Station after that foggy descent.
...Bury my body... c-cover my shell, What meaning in darkness? Yet here I remain... I'll wait here forever... till light blooms again...
...Drained...
I've grown stiff and tired over these many years and I've forgotten much, but the sound of the bell will always call me back.
The character stands in a dark, cavernous environment, about to inspect a glowing, oval-shaped object.

Higher beings, these words are for you alone. Your great strength marks you amongst us. Focus your soul and you shall achieve feats of which others can only dream. Collect SOUL by striking enemies. Once enough SOUL is collected, hold A to focus SOUL and HEAL.
The player encounters the Soul Master in a dim, mysterious environment with gothic architecture in the background.
Take this trinket for your efforts, and return with 500 Essence. Keep up your tireless work!
Consumed the Descending Dark. Tap A while holding DOWN to strike the earth with a burst of power. Spells will deplete SOUL. Replenish SOUL by striking enemies.
Have you met them, my former fellows? That's them outside, their bodies shambling around all mindless and empty. And I'm still alive to witness their pathetic demise.
The environment is dark and filled with crystals, labeled as Crystalised Mound.
Hallownest, it was once called. Supposedly the greatest kingdom there ever was, full of treasures and secrets.
Marked by KING'S BRAND. Hallownest shall recognise a new ruler. The Kingdom's gates will open.
Venture the depths of this land and slay its beasts. Prove yourself worthy to bear the mark of Hunter.
Isn't this a change from those twisting natural caverns? The rain does cast something of a sadness upon it all but the architecture is simply splendid.
Losing one's Geo is a terrible thing and it's so much more likely if you carry it about on yourself.
Taken the HUNTER'S JOURNAL
Actually, I wanted to ask a small favour of you. You see, there is a certain creature lurking just above us, in the heart of this temple...
Here ends the Pilgrim's Way. Hallownest's Heart lays open before you. Proceed onward to share in its glory.
A dark cave with glowing crystals and skull decorations, suggesting a mysterious, ominous atmosphere.
To claim its role requires strength of some magnitude. Prepare yourself well before attempting the task.
Isn't this a contrast from the Crossroads? Such a humid, lively place. The roads twist and turn in the most wonderful ways.
Neither place seems particularly welcoming so while my little treats last, I think I'll stay right here.
Did you visit that temple? A strange building I've heard, though I'd never dare the journey myself.
Higher beings, these words are for you alone. Beyond this point you enter the land of King and Creator. Step across this threshold and obey our laws.
The screenshot depicts a forested area with an NPC sitting down in a peaceful, dimly lit environment.
You've no doubt sensed my affluence. You're right to guess, I'm renowned amongst the upper caste of Hallownest.
The knight is sitting on a bench in a serene, glowing environment with hanging vegetation and ambient orbs. The map has been updated.
We shall enter that place no longer.
A cavern with a serene, aquatic atmosphere, filled with glowing jellyfish-like creatures and bubbles.
Another Hallownest Seal? Pass it over.
Prepare well, but don't dally. Were the Vessel to break prematurely, that plague would unleash with rage and power built of ages chained.
I'm quite content where I am.
I hope you aren't too disappointed by our little town, traveller. Though it's now a solemn place, once we were much more welcoming.
Dark, mysterious underground setting with an option to 'LISTEN'.
If you keep opening stag stations and beckoning me through them, perhaps I'll again find that Nest. Ahh, I would like that very much!
My King. I'm sorry... The sea calls...
Ha ha ha, do you know that one? It's one of my f-favourites! We can sing something else if you like. You start singing and I'll join in. I bet you have a b-b-beautiful singing voice! Ha ha ha!
It is true. True, that you were awaited. No. Perhaps that is inaccurate. True one like you was awaited.
That… would be fun… wouldn't it…?
Now some vicious types are crawling all over the place and the plants have grown wild.
Anyway, I'll let you return to your travels. With a little luck, we'll meet again. Be safe and farewell!
It must be cast away.
A memorial area in a cavern, dedicated to an Elder figure, with fungi and glowing spores.
Oh! One arrives. Far it walks to find me. Did it seek my aid? Or did the path carry it by chance to so pertinant a place?
Hello there! How delightful to meet another traveller on these forgotten roads.
There must be a lot of water up there somewhere. I suppose, if the cave roof stayed strong this long, it should hold for us.
My own route takes me towards that great city. If you search out the Nailsmith, it may not be long until our paths cross again.
The city looks to be built into an enormous cavern, and the rain pours down from cracks in the stone above.
It faced the Gendered Child? She's a fierce foe, strong in mind and body, striking reflection of her mother, though the two were permitted little time together.
A dark, eerie environment with decorative elements and a large, defeated creature.
Read together they paint a morbid tale. It seems fate was unkind to most who travel within Hallownest's ruin.
Oho! Who is that creeping out of the darkness? My, you're looking grim! A strange, empty face and a wicked looking weapon!
Oh. I thought you were someone else.
Have you seen them? The guards who still patrol this city, even after dying?
A Wanderer's Journal, eh?
Soul Catcher: Used by shamans to draw more SOUL from the world around them. Increases the amount of SOUL gained when striking an enemy with the nail.

Opening cutscene.
Hornet saved Knight when the cave collapsed.
The knight jumped down from the Mines to the RESTING GROUND.
In the City of Tears, there are three aligned statues and one statue wearing a strange mask, drenched by the heavy rain that falls like tears, with Hornet appearing at the end.
Knight
